name: Hercules
aliases: The Prince of Power; The Lion of Olympus; Harry Cleese; Victor Tegler
powersText:
Pre- Chaos War :
Superhuman strength, speed, stamina, durability and endurance
Healing factor
Resistance to all earthly diseases
Limited immunity to magic
Immortality
Wields adamantine mace
Post-Chaos War:
Highly skilled archer and hand-to-hand combatant
Exceptional physical condition
Use of mystical weapons
